We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Customer Service

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Client Relations and Communications:


	Develop and implement strategies to enhance client relationships and improve customer satisfaction.
	Oversee the communication of regular project updates to clients, ensuring timely and accurate information, especially for clients in the diaspora.
	Ensure all client interactions reflect Cruxstone Group&#39;s commitment to excellence and professionalism.


Instalment Collections:


	Manage the process of collecting instalment payments from clients, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
	Coordinate with the finance department to track and record all payments accurately.
	Address any issues or discrepancies in payment collections promptly.

	Ensure all client data is handled in compliance with the Nigerian Data Protection Regulation (NDPR) and other relevant laws.
	Implement and maintain data protection policies and procedures to safeguard client information.
	Conduct regular audits to ensure data protection measures are effective and up to date.


Client Engagement:


	Maintain an up-to-date database of client birthdays and ensure clients receive personalized birthday greetings.
	Develop and execute engagement strategies to strengthen client loyalty and retention.


Documentation and Receipts:


	Work closely with the relevant departments to ensure all client documentation issues are resolved promptly.
	Oversee the timely issuance of receipts for all client remittances.
	Ensure all client interactions and transactions are documented accurately and securely.

	Monitor and analyse client feedback to identify areas for improvement in service delivery.
	Develop and implement initiatives to enhance the overall client experience.
	Address and resolve client complaints and issues efficiently and effectively.

	Develop and inspire a team to implement the strategy and to achieve objectives and targets
	Develop team succession plan to ensure stability and assure talent readiness for promotion and expansion
	Lead, coach and develop direct reports and the team so they are engaged, fulfilling their potentials and delivering on their goals and objectives
	Mentor team to ensure personal and organizational development.

	Increase customer satisfaction by personalizing anniversaries and other cooperate gifts.

	Develop unit strategic objectives and goals with a monthly progress report to the management.
	Develop a customer satisfaction strategy for all our subsidiaries.

Head, Customer Service Job at Cruxstone Development and Investment Limited




        
    

        
        Cruxstone Development and Investment Limited is a metropolitan Real Estate Development and Investment firm, established in 2016 and with a track record of fastest selling and fastest growing high-end real estate developer in Nigeria. We boast of over 30 years of combined management experience in the real estate development and investment space and completed several millions of dollars’ worth, in urban real estate transactions all within the Lagos metropolis.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Customer Service

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Client Relations and Communications:
     

            
    




	Develop and implement strategies to enhance client relationships and improve customer satisfaction.
	Oversee the communication of regular project updates to clients, ensuring timely and accurate information, especially for clients in the diaspora.
	Ensure all client interactions reflect Cruxstone Group's commitment to excellence and professionalism.


Instalment Collections:


	Manage the process of collecting instalment payments from clients, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
	Coordinate with the finance department to track and record all payments accurately.
	Address any issues or discrepancies in payment collections promptly.


Data Protection:


	Ensure all client data is handled in compliance with the Nigerian Data Protection Regulation (NDPR) and other relevant laws.
	Implement and maintain data protection policies and procedures to safeguard client information.
	Conduct regular audits to ensure data protection measures are effective and up to date.


Client Engagement:


	Maintain an up-to-date database of client birthdays and ensure clients receive personalized birthday greetings.
	Develop and execute engagement strategies to strengthen client loyalty and retention.


Documentation and Receipts:


	Work closely with the relevant departments to ensure all client documentation issues are resolved promptly.
	Oversee the timely issuance of receipts for all client remittances.
	Ensure all client interactions and transactions are documented accurately and securely.


Customer Satisfaction:


	Monitor and analyse client feedback to identify areas for improvement in service delivery.
	Develop and implement initiatives to enhance the overall client experience.
	Address and resolve client complaints and issues efficiently and effectively.


Leadership:


	Develop and inspire a team to implement the strategy and to achieve objectives and targets
	Develop team succession plan to ensure stability and assure talent readiness for promotion and expansion
	Lead, coach and develop direct reports and the team so they are engaged, fulfilling their potentials and delivering on their goals and objectives
	Mentor team to ensure personal and organizational development.


Others:


	Increase customer satisfaction by personalizing anniversaries and other cooperate gifts.
	identify potential up-selling opportunities.
	Promote client referrals to increase market share.
	Effectively manage all clients and personal records.
	Develop policies and procedures for the unit use and business continuity
	Supervise the team’s activities to ensure accuracy in document preparation and filing.
	Develop unit strategic objectives and goals with a monthly progress report to the management.
	Develop a customer satisfaction strategy for all our subsidiaries.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their CV to: careers@cruxstone.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Service Support Center Manager Job at SpringRock Group




        
    

        
        SpringRock Group is a privately held energy company with main focus in Oil and Gas and Power sectors of the energy domain. We straddle both aisles of the Oil and Gas industry as E&P Operator and Oilfield Service provider.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Service Support Center Manager

Job Location: Lagos

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Service Support Center Manager to lead and manage its Service Support Center operations. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering exceptional customer experience, driving service excellence with a sales-focused mindset, and leading a high-performing service delivery team.
	This role requires strong leadership, customer-centric thinking, and the ability to build lasting client relationships while ensuring operational efficiency and compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective customer service procedures, policies, and standards
	Lead, motivate, and manage the Service Support Center team to achieve customer satisfaction and business goals
	Supervise daily service delivery operations and ensure timely resolution of customer issues
	Maintain accurate documentation, service records, and customer interactions
	Hire, train, coach, and mentor customer service agents
	Monitor service performance metrics, client satisfaction, and prepare detailed reports
	Upsell products and services to ensure repeat business and revenue growth
	Liaise with internal departments and third-party service providers to resolve client issues
	Set up, manage, and continuously improve the service desk for productivity and efficiency
	Ensure compliance with industry regulations, company policies, and QHSE standards
	Stay updated on industry trends, innovations, and best practices


Requirements & Experience


	Minimum of 16 years post-graduation experience in process-oriented organizations
	At least 10 years of experience in a Customer Service/Support Center environment
	Minimum of 4 years at a managerial level in customer experience or service delivery
	Strong understanding of service delivery, customer experience, sales, and negotiation techniques
	Proven leadership and people management experience
	Sales-oriented mindset with passion for service excellence
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and customer service software
	Hands-on experience with CRM and ERP systems (knowledge of Zoho is an advantage)
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Strong organizational, multitasking, and analytical skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Izabelle@5cee.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
